Senate Dems just blocked:

‚ùåEnhanced unemployment benefits
‚ùå$100B+ to gets kids back in school safely
‚ùåPPP funding to save jobs & small biz
‚ùåMore testing

‚ùåMore funding for vaccine development

South Dakotans & all Americans continue to struggle because of the COVID-19 pandemic. The common-sense, targeted bill we tried to move forward today would have provided immediate relief to families, businesses, schools and healthcare providers at a time when they need it most.
